TaskDescription.Detail: Store the value entered by the user and use it in the forms of text, number, date and array.

Assist.value: Ask the user to enter the animals.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.animals.
Enter a guide message as below. 'Type as below\nBear, Tiger, Fox, Dog, Cat'
Convert a string type variable the user entered into a array type variable.
Specify a variable to be converted. Type this.animals.
Enter the seperator. Type ', '.
Specify a variable to store the converted array. Type this.animalArray.
Print and check the converted array.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.animalArray.
Ask the user to enter today's date.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.today.
Enter a guide message as below. 'Enter today\'s date in the forms below. \n(2022-02-02, 2022/02/02, 2022.02.02)'
Ask the user to enter the number of months.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.monthOld.
Enter a guide message as below. 'Enter how many months have passed after its birth. (ex>12)'
Gets the birthday by today's date and the number of months.
Enter the date to which the number of months will be added Type this.today.
Enter the months to be added. Since we will subtract the number of months from the date, Type -this.monthOld.
Specify a variable to store the caculated date. Type this.birthday.
Convert the date to the specified format.
Enter the date to be converted. Type this.birthday.
Enter the format. Type 'yyyy : MM : dd'
Specify a variable to store the converted date. Type this.birthday to overwrite it.
Print and check the converted date.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.birthday.
Ask the user to enter the number of animals.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.count.
Enter a guide message as below. 'Enter a number you want. You can either enter integer or decimal \n(ex> 5, 10.123)'
Round the number the user entered to make it integer.
Enter the number to be rounded. Type this.count.
Enter the number of decimal places to round to. Type 0.
Specify a variable to store the rounded number. Type this.countRounded.
Print and check the rounded number.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.countRounded.
Ask the user to enter the index of the array.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.index.
Enter a guide message as below. 'What index of animals would you like to know?\n (ex> 0)'
Print and check the animal of the index in the array.
Type a sentence to be printed as below. this.countRounded +' '+ this.animalArray[this.index] + ' were born in ' + this.birthday
